thread.title_full: For Paris, see Villa Luxembourg - Review of Villa Luxembourg, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: geoffreyhants
title: For Paris, see Villa Luxembourg
text: The hotel was fine: good location, near a Metro station, close to Luxemburg Gardens, 30 mins. walk to the Eifel Tower, Louvre, etc. The breakfast was a much appreciated bonus, and the hotel staff were most helpful when confronted by a French air traffic controllers' strike on the day of our return to England. Also, prompt response to a blocked sink. Definitely an hotel to stay at again.
